title: bug splat
body:
Game crushes after champion select. This started after i closed replay from BaronReplays with alt+f4
r3dlog:
"000002.553|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "UX/FloatingText.bin" because it's not in the manifest.
000002.570|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Shared/Shared.bin" because it's not in the manifest."

replies.body:
Most RADS errors are caused by League not running with the right system permissions. To resolve this, I recommend running through the steps outlined in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). If you still have issues, go ahead and close out Baron Replays and any other replay app that may be interacting with the League files and causing issues.

Let me know if these steps helped.

Repair the client by clicking the question mark icon to the top right corner of the patcher and hitting "Repair". 

Let us know if this helped or not.

Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/khazix_deathblossom_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=re5tY9ln https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2014/12/Death-Blossom-Elise.jpg
